verses.roman:
tabe mahāprabhu saba bhakte bolāila
gauḍa-deśe yāha sabe vidāya karila

synonyms: tabe mahāprabhu—thereafter Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; saba—all; bhakte—the devotees; bolāila—called; gauḍa-deśe—to Bengal; yāha—return; sabe—all of you; vidāya karila—bade farewell.
translation: Thereafter, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu called for all the devotees and asked them to return to Bengal. In this way, He bade farewell to them.
